extensions.title: Extended Petrinet Extension
extensions.description: Extended Petrinets contain Reset and Inhibitor Arcs

extensions.title: BPMN Cost Extension
extensions.description: BPMN 1.1 extension for adding a cost attribute to activities

extensions.title: BPMN WikiRef Extension
extensions.description: BPMN 1.1 extension for adding a WikiRef attribute to all nodes.

extensions.title: BPMN Sub Set Extension
extensions.description: BPMN extension that reduces the available stencils.

extensions.title: BPMN 1.1 Basic Subset
extensions.description: A basic subset of BPMN 1.1 containing only task, sequence flow, start event, end event, parallel gateway and data-based XOR.

extensions.title: BPMN 2.0 Basic Subset
extensions.description: A basic subset of BPMN 2.0 containing only task, sequence flow, start event, end event, parallel gateway and data-based XOR.

extensions.title: BPMN Subset for Service Composition
extensions.description: A basic subset of BPMN that can be used in the Service Composer.

extensions.title: BPMN Subset for Service Composition in GoldenEye
extensions.description: A basic subset of BPMN that can be used in the Service Composer.

extensions.title: BPMN Extension for XForms User Interfaces
extensions.description: Extension for adding XForms user interface attributes to BPMN Tasks.

extensions.title: BPMN Subset for Design Thinking User Research
extensions.description: A basic subset of BPMN that can be used for user research.

extensions.title: BPEL4Chor Extension
extensions.description: BPEL4Chor extension for adding a messageLink edge and several BPEL4Chor rules.

extensions.title: jBPM Stencils
extensions.description: A subset of BPMN 1.2 for execution with jBPM

extensions.title: BPEL4Chor Grounding Extension
extensions.description: BPEL4Chor Grounding extension for adding grounding properties .

extensions.title: iBPMN Fault Handling Extension
extensions.description: A basic extension of iBPMN containing fault handling capabilities (i.e. silent/no actions, scopes, FCT handling, non-cancellation behavior using non-interrupting events).

extensions.title: BPMN 2.0 Choreographies
extensions.description: Adds support for Choreography-Diagrams to BPMN 2.0.

extensions.title: BPMN 2.0 Basic Subset for Choreographies
extensions.description: Adds support for a basic subset of Choreography-Diagrams to BPMN 2.0.

perspectives.title: Academic BPMN
perspectives.description: Academic perspective on BPMN. Features the complete standard.

perspectives.title: Beginner BPMN
perspectives.description: BPMN for beginners. Features a basic subset of the standard.

perspectives.title: Academic BPMN 2.0
perspectives.description: Academic perspective on BPMN 2.0. Features the complete standard.

perspectives.title: Beginner BPMN 2.0
perspectives.description: BPMN 2.0 for beginners. Features a basic subset of the standard.
